Assessment.QuestionText: You want to display a form containing two panels. The left pane of the form consists of a check box with the text "Company Policy". When the check box is selected, a message "You selected Company Policy" should be displayed in the right pane. Which one of the following codes help you to achieve this?

Options.Option:
SplitContainer spltcntrSelect = new SplitContainer();
CheckBox chkPolicy = new CheckBox();
Label lblSelection = new Label();

spltcntrSelect.BorderStyle = BorderStyle.FixedSingle;
chkPolicy.Text = "Company Policy";
spltcntrSelect.Panel1.Controls.Add(chkPolicy);
spltcntrSelect.Panel2.Controls.Add(lblSelection);

private void chkPolicy_CheckedChanged(object sender, EventArgs e)
{
  :if (chkPolicy.IsChecked)
  {
    lblSelection.Text = "You selected Company Policy.";
  }
}
